text: Ra Anumzamo'a Saioni vahera zamazeri knare nehuno, havizama hu'nea mopa eri knare nehuno, hagegema hu'nea mopa'a eri knare hanigeno Ideni hozagna hugahie. Ana nehuno kama kokana eri knare hanigeno, Anumzamofo hozagna hugahie. Ana hanige'za zavena nehe'za, musenkase zagame hu'za, Ra Anumzamofo agia ahentesga hu'za susu huntegahaze.
